article_title: PolitiFact: Testing claim on Donald Trump, single-payer health care
article_text:
By of the

New today from PolitiFact Wisconsin:

Green Bay-area U.S. Rep. Reid Ribble says Donald Trump "wants to replace" Obamacare "with a single-payer system, in which the government pays for care for all citizens. We check it out.

After you read the item and review our rating, come back here and leave your comments.
